Hero.name: Son Goku
Hero.power: Ki control, energy blasts, martial arts, teleportation and many more.

Hero.name: Superman
Hero.power: X-ray vision, super strenth, super speed, laser eyes and more.
Hero.identity: Clark Kent, alien from planet Krypton.

Hero.name: Wonder Woman
Hero.power: Invulnerability, super strength, super senses, object (bullet) deflect.

Hero.name: Asta
Hero.power: No magic, 5 leaf grimoire, magic cutting and mana eating swords.

Hero.name: Juno
Hero.power: Unbelievable mana amount, 4 leaf clover grimoire.
Hero.identity: Asta's childhood friend and rival for future Magic Emperor position.
